tool_description: Fast and Reliable Product Searches, Offers, Reviews, Best Sellers, Deals, and More on Amazon in Real-Time.
name: Real-Time Amazon Data
title: Real-Time Amazon Data

api_list.name: Product Details
api_list.description: Get additional product information / details such as description, about, rating distribution and specs.

required_parameters.name: asin
required_parameters.description:
Product ASIN for which to get details. Supports batching of up to 10 ASINs in a single request, separated by comma (e.g. *B08PPDJWC8,B07ZPKBL9V, B08BHXG144*).

Note that each ASIN in a batch request is counted as a single request against the plan quota.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG`

api_list.name: Product Reviews
api_list.description: Get and paginate through all product reviews on Amazon. Each page contains up to 10 reviews.

required_parameters.name: asin
required_parameters.description: Product asin for which to get reviews.

optional_parameters.name: star_rating
optional_parameters.description:
Only return reviews with a specific star rating.

**Default:** `ALL`

**Allowed values:** `ALL, 5_STARS, 4_STARS, 3_STARS, 2_STARS, 1_STARS, POSITIVE, CRITICAL`

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Find reviews matching a search query.

optional_parameters.name: current_format_only
optional_parameters.description: Only return reviews of the current format (product variant - e.g. Color). By default reviews are returned for all product variants.

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description:
Return reviews in a specific sort order.

**Default:** `TOP_REVIEWS`

**Allowed values:** `TOP_REVIEWS, MOST_RECENT`

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Results page to return.

**Default:** `1`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG`

optional_parameters.name: verified_purchases_only
optional_parameters.description: Only return reviews by reviewers who made a verified purchase.

optional_parameters.name: images_or_videos_only
optional_parameters.description: Only return reviews containing images and / or videos.

api_list.name: Best Sellers
api_list.description: Get Amazon Best Sellers, their ranks and more data available on Amazon.com. Supports all Amazon Best Seller lists: **Best Sellers**, **New Releases**, **Movers & Shakers**, **Most Wished For**, **Gift Ideas**.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description:
Best sellers category to return products for. Supports top level best sellers categories (e.g. software). In addition, subcategories / category path can be specified as well, separated by **/** (e.g. software/229535) - this can be seen in best sellers URLs, e.g. *https://www.amazon.com/Best-Sellers-Software-Business-Office/zgbs/software/229535*.

**e.g.** `software`
**e.g.** `software/229535`

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Type of Best Seller list to return.

**Default:** `BEST_SELLERS`

**Allowed values:** `BEST_SELLERS, GIFT_IDEAS, MOST_WISHED_FOR, MOVERS_AND_SHAKERS, NEW_RELEASES`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG`

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Results page to return.

**Default:** `1`

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for product offers on Amazon with support for multiple filters and options.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Search query. Supports both free-form text queries or a product asin.

optional_parameters.name: product_condition
optional_parameters.description:
Return products in a specific condition.

**Allowed values:** `NEW, USED, RENEWED, COLLECTIBLE`

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Results page to return.

**Default:** `1`

optional_parameters.name: min_price
optional_parameters.description: Only return product offers with price greater than a certain value. Specified in the currency of the selected country. For example, in case country=US, a value of *105.34* means *$105.34*.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG`

optional_parameters.name: max_price
optional_parameters.description: Only return product offers with price lower than a certain value. Specified in the currency of the selected country. For example, in case country=US, a value of *105.34* means *$105.34*.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description:
Find products with a specific brand. Multiple brands can be specified as a comma (,) separated list. The brand values can be seen from Amazon's search left filters panel, as seen [here](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=phone).

**e.g.** `SAMSUNG`
**e.g.** `Google,Apple`

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description:
Return the results in a specific sort order.

**Default:** `RELEVANCE`

**Allowed values:** `RELEVANCE, LOWEST_PRICE, HIGHEST_PRICE, REVIEWS, NEWEST, BEST_SELLERS`

optional_parameters.name: category_id
optional_parameters.description:
Find products in a specific category / department. Use the **Product Category List** endpoint to get a list of valid categories and their ids for the country specified in the request.

**Default:** `aps` (All Departments)

api_list.name: ASIN to GTIN
api_list.description: Convert an Amazon ASIN to GTIN / EAN / UPS identifiers. Valid values for `type` are `EAN-13`, `UPC`, or `ISBN`.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG`

api_list.name: Product Offers
api_list.description: Get the offers of a specific product by asin, in addition to all product details. The first offer in the list is the pinned offer returned by the **Search** endpoint.

required_parameters.name: asin
required_parameters.description:
Product ASIN for which to get offers. Supports batching of up to 10 ASINs in a single request, separated by comma (e.g. *B08PPDJWC8,B07ZPKBL9V, B08BHXG144*).

Note that each ASIN in a batch request is counted as a single request against the plan quota.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Results page to return.

**Default:** `1`

optional_parameters.name: product_condition
optional_parameters.description:
Find products in specific conditions, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `NEW, USED_LIKE_NEW, USED_VERY_GOOD, USED_GOOD, USED_ACCEPTABLE`.
**Default:** `NEW, USED_LIKE_NEW, USED_VERY_GOOD, USED_GOOD, USED_ACCEPTABLE`

**e.g.** `NEW,USED_LIKE_NEW`
**e.g.** `USED_VERY_GOOD,USED_GOOD,USED_LIKE_NEW`

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of offers to return.

**Default:** `100`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG`

optional_parameters.name: delivery
optional_parameters.description:
Find products with specific delivery option, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `PRIME_ELIGIBLE,FREE_DELIVERY`.

**e.g.** `FREE_DELIVERY`
**e.g.** `PRIME_ELIGIBLE,FREE_DELIVERY`

api_list.name: Deal Products
api_list.description: Get the products of a specific deal by Deal ID. Supports pagination using the *page* parameter. For now, only works for MULTI_ITEM deals with no canonical_deal_url (i.e. when deal_url is in the form of *https://amazon_domain/deal/deal_id*).

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description:
Return products in a specific order.

**Default:** `FEATURED`

**Allowed values:** `FEATURED, LOWEST_PRICE, HIGHEST_PRICE, REVIEWS, NEWEST, BEST_SELLERS`

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG`

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Results page to return.

**Default:** `1`

api_list.name: Product Category List
api_list.description: Get Amazon product categories per country / Amazon domain (for use with the "category_id" parameter of the Product Search only).

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG`

api_list.name: Deals
api_list.description: Get Amazon Deals (Today's Deals / Top Deals, Best Deals, and Lightning Deals) with support for all deal types, filters, and options available on Amazon.com.

optional_parameters.name: prime
optional_parameters.description: Only return prime deals.

optional_parameters.name: deal_state
optional_parameters.description:
Return deals in a specific state.

**Default:** `ALL`

**Allowed values:** `ALL, AVAILABLE, UPCOMING`

optional_parameters.name: deal_type
optional_parameters.description:
Return deals of a specific deal type.

**Default:** `ALL`

**Allowed values:** `ALL, DEAL_OF_THE_DAY, LIGHTNING_DEAL, BEST_DEAL`

optional_parameters.name: min_product_star_rating
optional_parameters.description:
Return deals with products star rating greater than a specific value

**Allowed values:** `1, 2, 3, 4`

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description:
How to sort the results.

**Default:** `FEATURED`

**Allowed values:** `FEATURED, LOWEST_DISCOUNT, HIGHEST_DISCOUNT, LOWEST_PRICE, HIGHEST_PRICE`

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to skip / index to start from (for pagination).

optional_parameters.name: max_discount_percent
optional_parameters.description: Only return deals with discount percentage lower than a certain value (0-100).

optional_parameters.name: prime_exclusive
optional_parameters.description: Only return prime exclusive deals.

optional_parameters.name: prime_early_access
optional_parameters.description: Only return prime early access deals.

optional_parameters.name: min_price
optional_parameters.description: Only return deals with price greater than a certain value. Specified in the currency of the selected country. For example, in case country=US, a value of *105.34* means *$105.34*.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG`

optional_parameters.name: max_price
optional_parameters.description: Only return deals with price lower than a certain value. Specified in the currency of the selected country. For example, in case country=US, a value of *105.34* means *$105.34*.

optional_parameters.name: min_discount_percent
optional_parameters.description: Only return deals with discount percentage greater than a certain value.

optional_parameters.name: categories
optional_parameters.description:
Return deals with products in specific categories / departments. Multiple categories can be specified as a comma (,) separated list. Numeric category id's can be found in the URL after selecting a specific category on https://www.amazon.com/deals.

**e.g.** `502394`
**e.g.** `2619525011,2617941011`
